name: Stonehide Reforged
description: When your Stonehide Lawachurl, who has this card equipped, defeats an opposing character: Stonehide Lawachurl will re-attach Stonehide and Stone Force.
descriptionraw: When your $[A2601], who has this card equipped, defeats an opposing character: $[A2601] will re-attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126011]</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C126012]</color>.
descriptionreplaced: When your Stonehide Lawachurl, who has this card equipped, defeats an opposing character: Stonehide Lawachurl will re-attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Stonehide</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Stone Force</color>.
